title: Is anyone here cant log in too?
body: i cant log in it says pvp.net server failed please riot fix this please

replies.body: If you're getting this after inputting your password, then it's likely there's an issue with connecting to the login server.  We were having some widespread issues yesterday, but should be resolved.  Next step I'd recommend is checking out our [login issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944) article which has steps to fix the most common causes of login issues that we see.  Let me know if it helps!
